reviewText: Everyday French is good enought to teach some words that are useful.  You will learn it fast and quickly. You are going to have to pronounce the word and sentences that will flash on the screen. You will had to rewind and  repent words you can't understand yet. But you will learn. Like Yoda says: learn you will.  Your will like it, if you are a visual aid junkie.  But, it is better, if you used a text book to study with, and a partner to pactice to with.
